TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RuleFiringRecord extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the firing record for an event that derives from the class and implements the interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The RuleFiringRecord class provides information that could be used to determine whether the firing of the event should be recorded.
## Examples The following code example shows how the RuleFiringRecord is used when passed to the <xref:System.Web.Management.IWebEventCustomEvaluator.CanFire%2A> method.
[!code-cs[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#22](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.management._28_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#22](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.management._28_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the last time that the event was last fired.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.DateTime> object representing when the event was last fired.

Docs.summary: Gets the total number of times that the event has been raised.
Docs.value: The total number of times the event has been raised.
